They had been declared unorthodox by Freemasonry.  The year after the Illuminati was conceived, all secret societies were deemed illegal.  They reformed in 1780 and started to infiltrate Freemasonry.  I could go on for days, but sit on this one...  Canon law is the body of laws & regulations made or adopted by ecclesiastical authority, for the government of the Christian organization and its members. It is the internal ecclesiastical law governing the Catholic Church (both Latin Rite and Eastern Catholic Churches), the Eastern and Oriental Orthodox churches, and the Anglican Communion of churches.  So he was the pioneer for the Scottish Rite, and first professor of canon law, and creator and first leader of the Illuminati.  This is real history, so where is my conspiracy or theory?
